content:
Hello,
I was reading about metadata blocks and saw the link to this document in the documentation:

â€œTips for Dataverse Software metadata blocks from the communityâ€ Google doc:Â https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XpblRw0v0SvV-Bq6njlN96WyHJ7tqG0WWejqBdl7hE0/edit?usp=sharing

It's empty -- is that meant to be the case?

Thanks,
Bethany
You're talking about the google doc linked from https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.4/admin/metadatacustomization.html#tips-from-the-dataverse-community
I know we revisited this recently but maybe we didn't merge the fix yet. :thinking:
Found it. Please see #10962 for some conversation between me, @Dieuwertje Bloemen and @Julian Gautier
In the end, we didn't address that empty doc, though we talked about it.
@Bethany Seeger please feel free to open an issue!

@Bethany Seeger thanks for creating this issue!

"Tips for Dataverse metadata" document is emptyÂ #11231
